system_overview.title: Alex AI YOLO Mode Integration System
system_overview.description: Comprehensive system integrating YOLO Mode understanding, babysitting warnings, and crew coordination
system_overview.key_insight: YOLO Mode has inherent limitations that cannot be overcome - this is by design

findings.yolo_mode_is_working: YOLO Mode is working exactly as designed
findings.limitations_are_by_design: File operations require confirmation by design for safety
findings.cannot_eliminate_all_prompts: YOLO Mode cannot eliminate all confirmation prompts
findings.safety_feature: Confirmation prompts are a safety feature, not a bug

can_automate: Terminal commands (git, npm, python, system operations)

babysitting_warning_system.title: Babysitting Warning System
babysitting_warning_system.description: Predicts when prompts will require manual confirmation

medium.suggestion: Be prepared to confirm with ⌘⮐ (Command + Enter)

crew_memory_synchronization.title: Crew Memory Synchronization

crew_members.alex_ai_coordinator: Fully integrated with babysitting warning system
crew_members.memory_manager: Stores and retrieves YOLO Mode knowledge
crew_members.workflow_optimizer: Designs workflows around YOLO Mode limitations

shared_understanding: YOLO Mode has inherent limitations that cannot be overcome
File operations always require confirmation (safety feature)
Use YOLO Mode for terminal commands, accept confirmations for file operations
This is not a bug - it's working as designed

workflow_optimization.title: Workflow Optimization

strategies.batch_operations: Group related file operations together to reduce prompt frequency
strategies.terminal_first: Use YOLO Mode for terminal commands, then confirm file operations
strategies.hybrid_approach: Combine YOLO Mode with other automation tools
strategies.accept_limitations: Accept that file operations require confirmation by design

efficiency_tips: Use YOLO Mode for system operations and terminal commands
Accept file operation confirmations quickly with keyboard shortcuts
Use terminal commands to prepare for file operations
Configure allowlist with all necessary terminal commands

supabase_integration.title: Supabase Memory Integration
memory_updates: YOLO Mode limitations stored in crew memory

guidance_messages.before_execution: 🚨 WARNING: This operation will require manual confirmation. Use ⌘⮐ (Command + Enter) for faster confirmation.
guidance_messages.during_execution: ⚠️ CONFIRMATION REQUIRED: Please confirm this operation to continue.
guidance_messages.after_execution: ✅ OPERATION COMPLETE: File operation confirmed and executed successfully.
guidance_messages.optimization_tip: 💡 TIP: Batch multiple file operations together to reduce confirmation prompts.
